name: medialytics
tagline: A self-hosted analytics platform for tracking media performance
description: Medialytics is a self-hosted media analytics platform that reports on content performance metrics. Itâ€™s designed for creators or media platforms who want to track views, user interactions, and overall engagement.

features.title: View Tracking
features.description: Monitor how many times each piece of content has been viewed

features.title: Engagement Metrics
features.description: Track likes, shares, comments, and other user interactions with content

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Understand viewer demographics, locations, and device types

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Generate reports showing top-performing content and engagement trends

features.title: Real-Time
features.description: See current viewer activity and popular content as it happens

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Track specific user actions or milestones within your media platform

features.title: Retention Analysis
features.description: Measure how long viewers watch videos and where they drop off

features.title: Comparison Tools
features.description: Compare performance across different content types, categories, or time periods
